description:
The quick hands of practiced pickpockets don’t stand a chance against this soft waist wallet. Travel-ready, this under-clothes design is equipped with a slash proof strap and RFID blocking material to safeguard your chip cards and ID.

  • 75-denier polyester with a 200-denier lining and PU coating for water resistance
  • Soft touch breathable backing is soft against your skin
  • Adjustable webbing waist belt has 2 strong wires inside, making it impossible to slash
  • Waistbelt side release buckle sits underneath a fabric slot on the pouch, out of the way
  • Zippered main compartment with interior divider is large enough to fit a passport
  • RFID blocking material for added security
name: Pacsafe Coversafe X100 RFID Waist Wallet - Unisex
